events.comment: explanation sorta: you race to the finish, wow, shocking there's switches that lower barriers that stops your opponent for a whopping 2(3) seconds first player to reach multiples of 3 points (3,6,9,etc) will get a "lap of honour", meaning the opposite player won't be able to move first player to reach multiples of 10 points (10,20,etc) will get a SpEcIaL ScReEn saying how cool they are who the hell is going to play this for this long is the true question here

action.name: Set value
action.param: (Var_Level.Local_P1Score > Var_Level.Local_P2Score ? "P1" : "P2")&" has the most score so far!"

sub-events.comment: that's right, i did a splitscreen system for a whole 1 (one) level
